reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Designing a power market protocol for China that enables better renewable energy integration

description.narrative: The project is designed to support China's orientation towards renewable energy by producing proposals for adoption by China's National Energy Administration. These include proposals, based on UK and US experience, for a market model, pricing mechanism and operation rules. The proposals will serve as a source of reference for China for its creation of a more competitive power market.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
